org.electrocodeogram.system
Class SystemRoot

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.electrocodeogram.system.SystemRoot

public final class SystemRoot
extends java.util.Observable

The main class of the ElectroCodeoGram's ECG Lab software. It is implemented using the Singleton design pattern, to make it globally accessible by all of ECG's subsystems. Access to this class is provided by the implemented Interfaces

  • @see org.electrocodeogram.system.ISystemRoot for other subsystems and
  • @see org.electrocodeogram.moduleapi.system.IModuleSystemRoot for modules.
During it's creation and it creates all other vital parts of the system as there are the
  • @see org.electrocodeogram.module.ModuleRegistry which is keeping track of @see org.electrocodeogram.module.Module instances currently running in the ECG Lab and available ModulePackages in the ModuleDirectory.
  • @see org.electrocodeogram.msdt.registry.MsdtRegistry which stores information about all @see org.electrocodeogram.msdt.MicroSensorDataType instances that are currently registered.
  • @see org.electrocodeogram.ui.Gui which is the graphical user interface.
There are severall command line parameters to toggle logging, disable the gui, or load an exisitng ModuleSetup, which are listed when the ECG Lab is started with java -jar ECGLab-jar -help.

Method Detail

getSystemInstance

public static ISystemRoot getSystemInstance()
Returns the singleton instance of a class that implements thy ISystemRoot interface. This reference is used to access ECG system components by ECG system components.

Returns:
The singleton instance of an ISystemRoot object

getModuleInstance

public static IModuleSystemRoot getModuleInstance()
Returns the singleton instance of a class that implements thy IModuleSystemRoot interface. This reference is used to access ECG system components by ECG modules.

Returns:
The singleton instance of an ISystemRoot object
